name: [PolicyInsight] LLM Cost Anomaly
message:
LLM cost has exceeded normal baseline by 2 standard deviations in the last hour.

This may indicate:
- Unusual spike in document processing volume
- Inefficient prompts causing high token usage
- Potential abuse or misconfiguration

Check:
- Recent document uploads
- LLM token usage per request
- Prompt optimization opportunities

@on-call-engineering

options.escalation_message: LLM cost anomaly persists. Review usage patterns and consider rate limiting.
